name: GOD WARS The Complete Legend - Beginners Support Set
detailed_description:
The ultimate items to help support beginner level players who have just started playing Strategic and Tactical RPGs.

In addition to the accessory set which enables you to substantially obtain experience points, gold, and JP, the powerful “Sun series” items
will definitely help you challenge the game!

【Additional Items】
Amaterasu’s Necklace / Amaterasu’s Earrings / Aome’s Necklace / Aome’s Earrings / Ookami’s Necklace / Ookami’s Earrings / Sun Sword / Sun Helmet / Sun Armor / Sun Gauntlet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/8/7
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.60 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9500 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/8/7
  • Processor: Core i5-2500 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: onboard chipset
